item.title: Freelance: A Retrospective
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A few weeks ago, I started got my first freelance frontend development project and I was a different person. I have had a few opportunties to do freelance work over the last few years, but each time I have buckled under anxiety and the dread of not being good enough. Due to some other things that are happening in my life, this time I chose to stare those worries in the face and accept their challenge.

item.title: Remove incomplete commit locks on the command line
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run these commands in the command line to clear incomplete commits: rm .git/COMMIT_EDITMSG rm .git/.COMMIT_EDITMSG.swp rm .git/index.lock Then add your changes, commit and push as you would normally.

item.title: Remove node_modules from Git repository
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run this command to remove node_modules files from your local repository git rm -r --cached node_modules Run this command to add node_modules to your .gitignore echo "node_modules" >> .gitignore

item.title: DIY banana face mask
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: In general I don’t do routine. My only routine is not having a routine. So as you may expect, I don’t really have a beauty or skincare regime: I wash my face in the shower üõÄ and splash my face with soap üßº in the evenings sometimes if I feel like it. I don’t wear much makeup, especially not foundation but I am a terrible face toucher and skin picker.

item.title: Treat yourself like a Sim
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Sometimes you have low days. Days that it is hard to get out of bed, let alone leave the house. For me, these days are usually paired with pajamas and mild anxiety of what is outside my door, and the guilt of failing to be a ‘normal’ human being. It is the sort of day where I will just plunge into a computer game as it means I have to make very little in the way of real life decisions.

item.title: Scroll snapping with CSS!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: CSS scroll snapping allows for controlled scrolling experiences. If a user scrolls partially down/across an element, the CSS can force the scroll to snap to the top of the element instead.. or something. I haven’t given this a go, because I only just found out ü§Ø Browser compatibility Fully-fledged in üçé Safari and ü§ñ Chrome support this feature in it latest builds. ü¶ä Firefox supports properties from an older specification.

item.title: Remove .DS_Store from Git repository
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run this command to remove .DS_Store files from your repository find . -name .DS_Store -print0 | xargs -0 git rm --ignore-unmatch Run this command to add .DS_Store to your .gitignore echo ."DS_Store" >> .gitignore

item.title: 2019 birthday wishlist
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Oh hey! It’s my 2Ô∏è‚É£7Ô∏è‚É£th birthday soon! üéâ Gift ideas As most of you know, I am trying to reduce my waste. This adventure has been touching so many parts of my life and I have been trying to find a maintainable balance. It also means I am questioning the social constructs that have a habit of generating waste, and at this time of year, I am focussing on birthdays, specifically.

item.title: Find all elements with attribute on page
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: You can list all elements on the page that have your selected attribute in the console. Inject the following code into the inspector console: 1function getAllElementsWithAttribute(attribute) { 2var matchingElements = []; 3var allElements = document.getElementsByTagName('*') 4for (var i = 0, n = allElements.length; i < n; i++) { 5 if (allElements[i].getAttribute(attribute) !== null) { 6 matchingElements.push(allElements[i]); 7 } 8} 9return matchingElements; 10} 11getAllElementsWithAttribute('data-foo'); // Your value here

item.title: About me
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: My name is The Dude. I have the following qualities: I rock a great beard I’m extremely loyal to my friends I like bowling That rug really tied the room together. my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
